title: Release Change Log 25/03/2024
body:
Release Version v4.232.0
  MediRecords Application
Fix applied:
Ensure SMS credits are not being purchased twice
Unticking "Community & Contact List" in the Practice's Biography page now correctly hides it from the patient Mobile APP
Enhanced platform security
Re-worked mandatory fields when using Admission ward/room/bed creation
The 'close' button is disabled on the claim submission model until the claim receives a status to prevent double-claiming 
  Appointment Widget
No changes
  Mobile Patient App
No changes
  ConnectAPI
Implement FHIR CREATE Questionnaire API
Add Search FHIR Questionnaire API
Enhanced API Optimisation for claiming
